wordpressPost.title: Pop Theme
wordpressPost.content:
Yay! Today I finally finished my latest theme for Shopify, Pop.

Making a responsive was brutal, but I think it paid off! On hindsight I think I should have used a framework to save time, but it was a good learning experience nonetheless.

I also have a tutorial coming up for setting up product tables (example page). I’m going to be in Montreal this weekend so I’m hoping to have it written next weel. Stay tuned!
